【Now Sports-體育】多蒙特歐聯被抽中與巴塞隆拿、國際米蘭同組，隊長列奧斯透露，抽籤之前已有隊友表示希望鬥巴塞。

歐聯分組賽抽籤剛出爐，F組4支球隊當中有多達3隊曾經贏過冠軍，分別是巴塞隆拿、多蒙特與國際米蘭，餘下一隊則是布拉格斯拉維亞。蜜蜂兵團隊長馬高列奧斯（Marco Reus）透露，原來有隊友「未卜先知」：「今天早上食早餐的時候，有幾名球員在說，如果抽到與巴塞同組將會極開心。結果真的抽中了，超棒！

對於所屬組別被視為「死亡之組」，列奧斯就指：「當然，這組很難應付，要跟以前未曾對過的對手交手。鬥巴塞的兩場比賽，對我們和球迷而言都肯定是節慶活動。我們對己隊的實力有信心；我們的目標是晉級！」

CEO華斯基同樣樂觀：「這組當然是一個重大挑戰，但2012/13球季的成功記憶猶新——己隊當時亦抽中在差不多艱難的小組，跟皇家馬德里、曼城和阿積士同組（多蒙特最終打入決賽，不敵拜仁慕尼黑得亞軍）。我們十分期待這幾場比賽！」

Marco Reus was left fuming after Borussia Dortmund conceded a late own goal to draw 2-2 at Eintracht Frankfurt on Sunday and lose ground on Bundesliga leaders RB Leipzig.

Dortmund twice took the lead but surrendered an equaliser on 88 minutes, failing to deal with two crosses before Japan midfielder Daichi Kamada forced Thomas Delaney to turn the ball into his own net.

The draw left Dortmund third, three points behind Leipzig and one adrift of defending champions Bayern Munich, who thrashed Cologne 4-0 on Saturday. Unbeaten Leipzig won 3-0 at Werder Bremen.

In Frankfurt, goals by Belgium midfielder Axel Witsel and England winger Jadon Sancho either side of an Andre Silva equaliser left Dortmund 2-1 up with fulltime approaching before Delaney's costly own goal.

Dortmund captain Reus could not hide his frustration.

"We are not seeing the thing through," the Germany international told Sky, bristling when asked if his team had a "mentality problem".

"Stop asking about this mentality shit – it's crap and it's the same questions every week."

Dortmund head coach Lucien Favre kept the same starting line-up which drew 0-0 at home to Barcelona in the Champions League in midweek.
Borussia Dortmund head coach Lucien Favre says his side's final passes cost them in their 2-2 draw with Eintracht Frankfurt.
